subject: Baseball
Music
lead_paragraph: Frank Sinatra’s defiant, triumphant song became a Yankee Stadium staple in 1980, and its emergence was as much about the city as about George Steinbrenner or Sinatra himself.
snippet: Frank Sinatra’s defiant, triumphant song became a Yankee Stadium staple in 1980, and its emergence was as much about the city as about George Steinbrenner or Sinatra himself.
